data.eml:eml: Grania (Annelida: Clitellata: Enchytraeidae) of the Great Barrier Reef, Australia, including four new species and a re-description of Grania trichaeta Jamieson, 1977

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wit, Pierre De, Rota, Emilia, Erséus, Christer (2009): Grania (Annelida: Clitellata: Enchytraeidae) of the Great Barrier Reef, Australia, including four new species and a re-description of Grania trichaeta Jamieson, 1977. Zootaxa 2165: 16-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.189048
